document_data.name: Irbryth Authamaun
document_data.mainbody:
'''Irbryth Authamaun''' was a [[human]] [[sage]] inhabiting [[Waterdeep]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He knew just about everything there was to know about Waterdeep.
{{quote|...folk who stand in the streets crying torrid and dramatic headlines and selling both sides of a long strip of [[paper]], usually rolled into a scroll, that have been printed with crude summaries of the latest news and gossip.|Ibryth describing broadsheets to a visitor to the City of Splendors}}
document_data.Activities: Irbryth specialized in the lore of Waterdeep, with a special emphasis on the city's [[broadsheet]]s and history.
document_data.Home: He lived in a house in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]],{{Cite web/Realmslore/Broadcryers of Waterdeep II: Perils and Presses}} This house served as his home and office.
